caption:
“Blessed are the commuters.”

Reflection:
God rides the morning train, stands in the traffic, and listens amid the noise.

Commentary:
This line reminds us that the divine is not distant from routine. Even in the rush, sacred presence moves beside us.

#VeniPublishing #VeniFaithful #PilgrimHeart #UrbanMonk #BlessedInTheBusy #FaithInMotion #CitySaints #BibleVerseOfTheDay #ScriptureOfTheDay
